00027 #include <GisCommon.h>
00028 #include <common/Dimensionality.h>
00029 #include <geometry/IDirectPosition.h>
00030 #include <geometry/ILinearRing.h>
00031 class GisGeometryStreamFactory; // forward declare
00032 /// \brief
00033 /// The GisGeometryStreamReader class is a reader for serialized geometric data (abstract). The data source is defined by the implementation.
00034 /// GisGeometryStreamReader is a helper type and does not inherit from GisIGeometry.
00035 class GisGeometryStreamReader /* Abstract */ : public GisIDisposable
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00039     /// \brief
00040     /// Gets an array representing the entire serialized Geometry.
00041     /// 
00042     /// \return
00043     /// Returns the byte array
00044     /// 
00045     GISGEOM_API virtual GisByteArray * GetData() = 0;
00046 
00047     /// \brief
00048     /// Sets the array used by the reader.
00049     /// 
00050     /// \param data 
00051     /// Input array object
00052     /// 
00053     /// \return
00054     /// Returns nothing
00055     /// 
00056     GISGEOM_API virtual void SetData(
00057         GisByteArray * data) = 0;
00058 
00059     /// \brief
00060     /// Sets the array used by the reader.
00061     /// 
00062     /// \param data 
00063     /// Input array data
00064     /// \param count 
00065     /// Input number of bytes in the array
00066     /// The caller must guarantee the validity of the array for the lifetime
00067     /// of the associated geometry stream.
00068     /// 
00069     /// \return
00070     /// Returns nothing
00071     /// 
00072     GISGEOM_API virtual void SetData(
00073         const GisByte * data,
00074         GisInt32 count) = 0;
00075 
00076     /// \brief
00077     /// Gets the amount of data in the array returned by GetData(), in bytes.
00078     /// 
00079     /// \return
00080     /// Returns the number of bytes of Geometry data
00081     /// 
00082     GISGEOM_API virtual GisInt32 GetLength() = 0;
00083 
00084 
00085     /// \brief
00086     /// Advances the current position by skipping past bytes.
00087     /// 
00088     /// \param count 
00089     /// Input number of bytes to skip
00090     /// 
00091     /// \return
00092     /// Returns nothing
00093     /// 
00094     GISGEOM_API virtual void SkipBytes(
00095         GisInt32 count) = 0;
00096 
00097 
00098     /// \brief
00099     /// Advances the current position by skipping past integers.
00100     /// 
00101     /// \param count 
00102     /// Input number of integers to skip
00103     /// 
00104     /// \return
00105     /// Returns nothing
00106     /// 
00107     GISGEOM_API virtual void SkipInts(
00108         GisInt32 count) = 0;
00109 
00110 
00111     /// \brief
00112     /// Advances the current position by skipping past doubles.
00113     /// 
00114     /// \param count 
00115     /// Input number of doubles to skip
00116     /// 
00117     /// \return
00118     /// Returns nothing
00119     /// 
00120     GISGEOM_API virtual void SkipDoubles(
00121         GisInt32 count) = 0;
00122 
00123 
00124     /// \brief
00125     /// Advances the current position by skipping past geometric
00126     /// positions with the given dimension.
00127     /// 
00128     /// \param dimension 
00129     /// Input dimensionality of the positions (see GisDimensionality)
00130     /// \param count 
00131     /// Input number of positions to skip
00132     /// 
00133     /// \return
00134     /// Returns nothing
00135     /// 
00136     GISGEOM_API virtual void SkipDirectPositions(
00137         GisInt32 dimension,
00138         GisInt32 count) = 0;
00139 
00140     /// \brief
00141     /// Resets the current position to the beginning of the stream.
00142     /// 
00143     /// \return
00144     /// Returns nothing
00145     /// 
00146     GISGEOM_API virtual void Reset() = 0;
00147 
00148     /// \brief
00149     /// Reads one number as a "double" from current position in the stream.
00150     /// 
00151     /// \return
00152     /// Returns The next number in the stream
00153     /// 
00154     GISGEOM_API virtual double ReadDouble() = 0;
00155 
00156     /// \brief
00157     /// Reads one number as a "GisInt32" from the stream.
00158     /// 
00159     /// \return
00160     /// Returns The next number in the stream
00161     /// 
00162     GISGEOM_API virtual GisInt32 ReadInt() = 0;
00163 
00164     /// \brief
00165     /// Reads one byte from the stream.
00166     /// 
00167     /// \return
00168     /// Returns The next byte in the stream
00169     /// 
00170     GISGEOM_API virtual GisByte ReadByte() = 0;
00171 
00172     /// \brief
00173     /// Reads a geometric position with the given dimensionality from the stream.
00174     /// 
00175     /// \return
00176     /// Returns The numbers in the stream as a GisIDirectPosition
00177     /// 
00178     GISGEOM_API virtual GisIDirectPosition * ReadDirectPosition(GisInt32 dimension) = 0;
00179 
00180     /// \brief
00181     /// Reads a geometric position with the given dimensionality from the stream, 
00182     /// by value of its ordinates (for performance).
00183     /// 
00184     /// \param dimensionality 
00185     /// Input Dimensionality of ordinates in this position.
00186     /// \param x 
00187     /// Output X ordinate value.
00188     /// \param y 
00189     /// Output Y ordinate value.
00190     /// \param z 
00191     /// Output Z ordinate value.
00192     /// \param m 
00193     /// Output M ordinate value.
00194     /// 
00195     /// \return
00196     /// Returns nothing
00197     /// 
00198     GISGEOM_API virtual void ReadDirectPositionByMembers(GisInt32 dimensionality, double *x, double *y, double *z, double *m) = 0;
00199 
00200     /// \brief
00201     /// Gets a factory object that can create more streams of the same implementation type as this object.
00202     /// 
00203     /// \return
00204     /// Returns A Geometry stream factory
00205     /// 
00206     GISGEOM_API virtual GisGeometryStreamFactory * GetFactory() = 0;
00207 
00208 protected:
00209 
00210     /// \brief
00211     /// Constructs a default instance of a GisGeometryStreamReader.
00212     /// 
00213     /// \return
00214     /// Returns nothing
00215     /// 
00216     GISGEOM_API GisGeometryStreamReader() {};
00217 
00218     /// \brief
00219     /// Default destructor.
00220     /// 
00221     /// \return
00222     /// Returns nothing
00223     /// 
00224     GISGEOM_API virtual ~GisGeometryStreamReader() {};
00225 };
00226 #endif
